webcam.screen.webcam.resolution.tooltip: Device image resolution. Note that actual display quality depends on server configuration
webcam.screen.webcam.fps.tooltip: Device target frame rate. This setting only changes the TARGET frame rate and may have no real effect
webcam.screen.webcam.advanced.not_availa: Cloth Config API is required to view the advanced settings
webcam.screen.advanced.general.max_devic:
Number of maximum devices to check.
Don't set this higher, if you don't really have such number of devices
webcam.screen.advanced.general.packet_bu:
UDP video packets may arrive out of order.
This setting sets the maximum number of packets to hold in waiting for a missing packet
webcam.screen.advanced.general.max_bitra:
Limits the outgoing video bitrate (kbps).
Actual bitrate is configured on the server and is usually much lower
webcam.screen.advanced.hud.icon_x.descri:
X coordinate of the webcam icon on the screen.
May be negative to attach to the right side of the screen
webcam.screen.advanced.hud.icon_y.descri:
Y coordinate of the webcam icon on the screen.
May be negative to attach to the bottom side of the screen
